data.actual_result: Members & Bans panel search fields carry over to each other
data.expected_result: Members & Bans panel search fields do not carry over to each other
data.short_description: Members & Bans search text field entries carry over to each other
data.steps_to_repro: - Have View Audit Log & Ban Members permission in a server - Go into the Members panel in the server's  Server Settings - Enter anything into the search field - Go into the Bans panel and observe the search field having the same text that you entered into the Members text field
